abstract: When a scientist is injured during a research expedition in Papua New Guinea, team members seek medical advice via satellite phone.
snippet: When a scientist is injured during a research expedition in Papua New Guinea, team members seek medical advice via satellite phone.
lead_paragraph: Jack Dumbacher, curator of ornithology and mammalogy at the California Academy of Sciences, writes from Milne Bay, Papua New Guinea, where he is studying island birds and their diseases.

headline.main: Stitches on an Off Day in Budibudi
